description:
Keroro decides older things are better, and turns everyone`s stuff into old-fashioned versions!  (Dororo sobs because he`s unaffected.)  Later on, Natsumi is being suspiciously nice to Keroro.  What possible reason could there be?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Furuki ni Manabe de Arimasu
Keroro, Learning with the Old / Natsumi, Gentleness is a Sin...
ケロロ 古きに学べ であります / 夏美 優しさは罪 であります
